Package com.example.employeemanagement.controller

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.employeemanagement.controller.EmployeeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/employees") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class EmployeeController extends Object
This class represents the REST API controller for employees.
